channel.title: AncientBlitz | A new beginning. 24/7 | Friendly Community | Active Staff
channel.description:
This is a brand new server 7/17/12, and we would like to welcome everyone. We have a friendly community and staff, and have great updates everyday! We try our hardest here to make everyone have a great time.
[center]Website: [url=Http://www.ancientblitz.com]Http://www.ancientblitz.com[/url] Play Now: [url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/webclient.html]AncientBlitz - Its all about PK'ing[/url] Download: [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/38199859/client.jar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/38199859/client.jar[/url] [/center]
[center]Features: Awesome PvP Great Switching No DC's - very stable Mem usage fixed (Client mem leak fixed - creds to arrowzflame) Fullscreen in webclient WITH NO FUCKING LAG Quick prayers and curses 100% client sided saving ect User & pass saves World switching (1 is regular world and 2 is developers wich is set to localhost) Custom minigames such as new fightcaves for new rs firecape Barbarian assault Most skills 100% like rs such as firemaking, woodcutting ,mining, cooking ect. All skills All special weapons All PvP Armour Tons of Bosses Great training area's Skilling Zone Helpful community 24/7 Server Great website Friendly staff Mysql Pooling Hyperions Game Engine, event system and task system. Flax spinning Redid fishing 2 100% Agility courses. Gnome & Barbarian Bones on altar is automatic 2 random events. The sandwhich lady and genie random. Public construction. Storing items in a BoB. Fixed every dupe I can find. Reduced memory usage in client. 8 different crowns. Loyalty titles to chatbox and in front of names. Donators have 3 different crown options. Gambling box which you have a random chance at a rare item.
Media:
Construction Skill! [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/542/constructionp.gif/][IMG]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/4072/constructionp.gif[/img][/URL]
Over 15 Bosses to fight! Inlcuding NEX! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fdrVt.png[/img]
Bank PIN's to keep your account safe! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PZgbj.png[/img]
Many Skill's with many features! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9Vk2g.png[/img]
Awesome Full Screen on Webclient! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k17Fg.jpg[/img]
Great Training Area's! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nFbOV.png[/img]
Skyrwyrm's to obtain Korasi, and other cool items! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WILt2.png[/img]
Frost Dragon's for money and great Prayer EXP! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/awKaa.png[/img]
Dicing for your million's of GP Dreams! [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/59/35650043.png/][IMG]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/6718/35650043.png[/img][/URL]
Absolutely Amazing PK'ing! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LAul7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pbsjv.png[/img]
Overload's! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dONBV.png[/img]
Thanks for reading.
Website: [url=Http://www.ancientblitz.com]Http://www.ancientblitz.com[/url] Play Now: [url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/webclient.html]AncientBlitz - Its all about PK'ing[/url] Download: [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/38199859/client.jar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/38199859/client.jar[/url]
[/center]
[URL=http://flgc.info/MqKSnX][IMG]http://s09.flagcounter.com/count/GFvW/bg_FFFFFF/txt_000000/border_CCCCCC/columns_6/maxflags_30/viewers_AncientBlitz/labels_0/pageviews_0/flags_0/[/img][/URL]
[center]READ
Before you tell me this is a fucking leech, go on and play and you will see how much I have fixed up... Yes the fucking base is InsanityX but I have worked on it quite a bit. Almost every feature listed above is something I did.[/center]

item.title: AncientBlitz | A new beginning. 24/7 | Friendly Community | Active Staff
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Soulcist:

You need to fix the re-directs, the forums will sometimes make users go to /index.php when the thing is SUPPOSE to go to /index2.php (I don’t know why you have it like that).

Thanks for this, I recently had to change the forum’s because ancientblitz.com would redirect to index.php instead of home.php so so that its index2 it doesn’t do it anymore. I’ll fix the server re-directs tonight, I’m going to work right now.

Read full topic

item.title: AncientBlitz | A new beginning. 24/7 | Friendly Community | Active Staff
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:3, topic:450044”]Construction could be a lot better, but at least you have it.

Storing items in a BoB

Pretty much everyone has this now, if you want to have original summoning features, complete summoning clipping + proper pathfinding/calling.

My honest opinion? It looks better than half of the servers out there, but could be improved.[/quote]

I posted it because InsanityX did not have.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Construction could be a lot better, but at least you have it.

Storing items in a BoB

Pretty much everyone has this now, if you want to have original summoning features, complete summoning clipping + proper pathfinding/calling.

My honest opinion? It looks better than half of the servers out there, but could be improved.

item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

This is a brand new server 7/17/12, and we would like to welcome everyone. We have a friendly community and staff, and have great updates everyday! We try our hardest here to make everyone have a great time.

[center]Website: Http://www.ancientblitz.com
Play Now: AncientBlitz - Its all about PK’ing
Download: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/38199859/client.jar
[/center]

[center]Features:
Awesome PvP
Great Switching
No DC’s - very stable
Mem usage fixed (Client mem leak fixed - creds to arrowzflame)
Fullscreen in webclient WITH NO FUCKING LAG
Quick prayers and curses 100% client sided saving ect
User & pass saves
World switching (1 is regular world and 2 is developers wich is set to localhost)
Custom minigames such as new fightcaves for new rs firecape
Barbarian assault
Most skills 100% like rs such as firemaking, woodcutting ,mining, cooking ect.
All skills
All special weapons
All PvP Armour
Tons of Bosses
Great training area’s
Skilling Zone
Helpful community
24/7 Server
Great website
Friendly staff
Mysql Pooling
Hyperions Game Engine, event system and task system.
Flax spinning
Redid fishing
2 100% Agility courses. Gnome & Barbarian
Bones on altar is automatic
2 random events. The sandwhich lady and genie random.
Public construction.
Storing items in a BoB.
Fixed every dupe I can find.
Reduced memory usage in client.
8 different crowns.
Loyalty titles to chatbox and in front of names.
Donators have 3 different crown options.
Gambling box which you have a random chance at a rare item.

Media:

Construction Skill!

Over 15 Bosses to fight! Inlcuding NEX!

Bank PIN’s to keep your account safe!

Many Skill’s with many features!

Awesome Full Screen on Webclient!

k17Fg.jpg1920×1080

Great Training Area’s!

Skyrwyrm’s to obtain Korasi, and other cool items!

Frost Dragon’s for money and great Prayer EXP!

Dicing for your million’s of GP Dreams!

Absolutely Amazing PK’ing!

Overload’s!

Thanks for reading.

Website: Http://www.ancientblitz.com
Play Now: AncientBlitz - Its all about PK’ing
Download: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/38199859/client.jar

[/center]

[center]READ

Before you tell me this is a fucking leech, go on and play and you will see how much I have fixed up… Yes the fucking base is InsanityX but I have worked on it quite a bit. Almost every feature listed above is something I did.[/center]
